overview: Dr. Abhijit Shanbhag leads the day-to-day operations of Graymatics. Previous to founding Graymatics, he was the CTO of Scintera, which he co-founded in 2001, and continues to serve on the Board of Directors. Under his leadership and vision, Scintera developed the industryâ€™s first programmable RF signal processor, the lowest power multi-Gigabit signal processor in industry and is emerging to be a leading semiconductor player in the communications space. Previous to Scintera, Dr. Shanbhag held key technical and management roles at Qualcomm, Ericsson and Morphics. He holds a BS from IIT-Bombay and a PhD from University of Southern California, where he continues to be closely involved as an Advisory Board member.
